lead_paragraph: Pete Rose is appealing directly to baseball's Hall of Fame to restore his eligibility, arguing the lifetime ban he agreed to in 1989 was never intended to keep him out of Cooperstown.

headline.print_headline: Banned Rose Appeals to Hall of Fame for Eligibility
headline.main: Banned Rose Appeals to Hall of Fame for Eligibility
